mapper.insert: insert into TBL_CLASS_BOARD (CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_TITLE, CLASS_START_DATE, CLASS_END_DATE, CLASS_PROCESS, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_ADDRESS, CLASS_MAJOR, CLASS_INTRODUCE, CLASS_PLAN, CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, CLASS_LEVEL, CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUMBER) values (SEQ_CLASS_NUMBER.NEXTVAL,#{classTitle},#{classStartDate},#{classEndDate},#{classProcess},#{classPrice}, #{classAddress},#{classMajor},#{classIntroduce},#{classPlan},sysdate,1,sysdate,#{userNumber})
mapper.select: select RNUM, CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CLASS_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS CLASS_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(CLASS_END_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS CLASS_END_DATE, CLASS_PROCESS, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_ADDRESS, CLASS_MAJOR, CLASS_INTRODUCE, CLASS_PLAN, CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, CLASS_LEVEL, CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUMBER, USER_NAME, USER_LEVEL, APPLY_EDUCATION from (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, CB.CLASS_NUMBER, CB.CLASS_TITLE, CB.CLASS_START_DATE, CB.CLASS_END_DATE, CB.CLASS_PROCESS, CB.CLASS_PRICE, CB.CLASS_ADDRESS, CB.CLASS_MAJOR, CB.CLASS_INTRODUCE, CB.CLASS_PLAN, CB.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, CB.CLASS_LEVEL, CB.CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, CB.USER_NUMBER, CB.USER_NAME, CB.USER_LEVEL, CB.APPLY_EDUCATION FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, CB2.CLASS_NUMBER, CB2.CLASS_TITLE, CB2.CLASS_START_DATE, CB2.CLASS_END_DATE, CB2.CLASS_PROCESS, CB2.CLASS_PRICE, CB2.CLASS_ADDRESS, CB2.CLASS_MAJOR, CB2.CLASS_INTRODUCE, CB2.CLASS_PLAN, CB2.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, CB2.CLASS_LEVEL, CB2.CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, CB2.USER_NUMBER, U2.USER_NAME, U2.USER_LEVEL, MA2.APPLY_EDUCATION FROM TBL_CLASS_BOARD CB2 JOIN TBL_USERS U2 ON CB2.USER_NUMBER = U2.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMTO_APPLY MA2 ON U2.USER_NUMBER = MA2.USER_NUMBER order by class_number desc ) CB WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} and class_level = 2 and CLASS_NUMBER NOT IN (SELECT CLASS_NUMBER FROM TBL_PAYMENT) ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

SELECT CB.CLASS_NUMBER, CB.CLASS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CB.CLASS_START_DATE, 'YYYY"."MM"."DD') AS CLASS_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(CB.CLASS_END_DATE, 'YYYY"."MM"."DD') AS CLASS_END_DATE , CB.CLASS_PROCESS, CB.CLASS_PRICE, CB.CLASS_ADDRESS, CB.CLASS_MAJOR, CB.CLASS_INTRODUCE, CB.CLASS_PLAN, TO_CHAR(CB.CLASS_REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY"."MM"."DD') AS CLASS_REGISTER_DATE , CB.CLASS_LEVEL, CB.CLASS_UPDATE_DATE, CB.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_LEVEL, MA.APPLY_EDUCATION FROM TBL_CLASS_BOARD CB JOIN TBL_USERS U ON CB.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMTO_APPLY MA ON U.USER_NUMBER = MA.USER_NUMBER where CLASS_NUMBER = #{classNumber} and (class_level = 2 or class_level = 3)
SELECT COUNT(CLASS_NUMBER) FROM TBL_CLASS_BOARD where class_level = 2
